title: Ticket #2799: Regression tests for absent ads.
description:
In particular, the regression tests should:

1. Verify that ads go absent when expected, and none do otherwise. 2. Verify that the collector respects ABSENT_REQUIREMENTS. 3. Verify that stale (absent) ads are reaped. 4. Check that absent ads properly become present when re-advertised.

To the maximum extent possible, watch the log and the offline store to determine when to run condor_status.
